org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Interface Table.CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTable.CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilderImpl
    Enclosing interface:
    Table
    Deprecated. 
    Since 2.4.0, will be removed in 4.0.0. For internal test use only, do not use it any more.

    @Deprecated
public static interface Table.CheckAndMutateWithFilterBuilder
    A helper class for sending checkAndMutate request with a filter.
